Class ScaleContextWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.libav.swscale.ScaleContextWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

extends Object
implements IScaleContextWrapper
    Wrapper for the SWScaleContext.
    Author:
    Ondrej Perutka

      • scale

        public int scale(IFrameWrapper src,
        IFrameWrapper dst,
        int srcSliceY,
        int srcSliceHeight)
          throws LibavException
        Description copied from interface: IScaleContextWrapper
        Scale the given slice of the source frame.
        Specified by:
        scale in interface IScaleContextWrapper
        Parameters:
        src - source frame
        dst - allocated destination frame
        srcSliceY - Y position of the slice in the source frame
        srcSliceHeight - height of the slice from the source frame
        Returns:
        the height of the output slice
        Throws:
        LibavException - if the scale context has been freed
